name: string
signature: { (encoding?: string): (command: Command) => Effect<string, PlatformError, CommandExecutor>; (command: Command, encoding?: string): Effect<string, PlatformError, CommandExecutor>; }
description:
Runs the command returning the entire output as a string with the
specified encoding. If an encoding is not specified, the encoding will default to `utf-8`.
documentation:
Runs the command returning the entire output as a string with the
specified encoding.

If an encoding is not specified, the encoding will default to `utf-8`.
